name: Art Deco Hotel Dellago

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall a bad experience. The hotel is located on lake Lugano, which is great! The hotel restaurant is also very nice, with nice staff and great food! But the rooms are terribly loud and uncomfy. I got the impression that the hotel was a newly built facility, but I could have gathered from the hotel website that this is not the case, it is in fact a renovated building. Unfortunately, whilst renovating they must have forgotten to isolate the rooms as I could not sleep a single minute due to cars outside and other guests inside (I sleep lightly). Breakfast made up for a bit, but still, sleep is of importance in a hotel for me. My advice: have dinner here and sleep somewhere else!
reviews.title: Dissappointing

reviews.text: In those early morning hours between asleep and awake, my thoughts turn to the Hotel Dellago, and beautiful Melide, The incredible and entirely individual rooms, the views, the veranda for breakfast and coffee, the deck for lounging, the day beds, a perfect spot to enjoy a nite cap before retiring.........I cannot wait to return, and try another room in this Fabulous hotel.
reviews.title: Hotel Del Lago........FABULOUS!
Almost like heaven
reviews.text: Outstanding Hotel, great view over lake and mountains, amazing rooms all designed differently (we had booked Lemon & Lime, which was perfect for a small family with 18 months old kid). Restaurant Terrasse and Lounge areas with romantic & cosy touch, excellent breakfast buffet and great dinner. Would love to come back again.
My wife and I and our 2 kids ( 15 and 12 ) stayed here for 3 nights.
reviews.title: Hip hotel with great food
Not as cute as promised
reviews.text: I found this hotel by searching for hip hotels in Switzerland.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a small boutique hotel situated directly on the lake. You can literally dive into the lake from the sundeck.
reviews.title: Awesome Designhotel with unique location

reviews.text: We had the room "Lemon and Lime" which was able to accomodate the 4 of us reasonably well. The rooms are bright and clean with a magnificent view of the lake. Our room was airconditioned.
reviews.title: Dellago is a real treat

description: The Dellago was built as a small family hotel around 1907 and has since seen many concepts & transformations, but it has never been completely restructurated: this place has style and patina.as a holiday hotel, there is not enough space, as a design hotel we are much too improvised and for families we are far from being suitable, but for a relaxing city escape in jeans and chucks it's absolutely gorgeous. 21 simple or stylish, basic and luxurious, tiny and huge but always surprising rooms, an excellent fish and seafood restaurant, cool sound, wacky people and a lake lounge where your feet sometimes literally get wet are all perfect reasons to forget about the daily hassle for a couple of precious moments.
